# ods-link



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute        | Description                                                                                             | Type                                                                                                                                      | Default     |
| ---------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `ariaRole`       | `aria-role`      | Defines the ARIA role for the link element.                                                             | `"button" \| "checkbox" \| "menuitem" \| "menuitemcheckbox" \| "menuitemradio" \| "option" \| "radio" \| "switch" \| "tab" \| "treeitem"` | `undefined` |
| `download`       | `download`       | Whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its filename if so                    | `string`                                                                                                                                  | `undefined` |
| `href`           | `href`           | The address of the hyperlink                                                                            | `string`                                                                                                                                  | `undefined` |
| `hreflang`       | `hreflang`       | Human language of the linked resource                                                                   | `string`                                                                                                                                  | `undefined` |
| `ping`           | `ping`           | URLs to ping                                                                                            | `string`                                                                                                                                  | `undefined` |
| `referrerpolicy` | `referrerpolicy` | Referrer policy for fetches initiated by the element                                                    | `string`                                                                                                                                  | `undefined` |
| `rel`            | `rel`            | Relationship between the location in the document containing the hyperlink and the destination resource | `string`                                                                                                                                  | `undefined` |
| `target`         | `target`         | Browsing context for the hyperlink navigation                                                           | `"_blank" \| "_parent" \| "_self" \| "_top"`                                                                                              | `undefined` |
| `type`           | `type`           | Hint for the type of the referenced resource                                                            | `string`                                                                                                                                  | `undefined` |
